description:
Tsuna and Gokudera have come to the future Namimori. There, the Vongola Family has been pushed to the point of destruction. The enemy is the Millefiore Family, which is led by Byakuran. They are trying to annihilate the Vongola and have attacked not only family members but people who are involved with the family as well. Reborn has made it safely to the Vongola hideout. Tsuna hears from Reborn and Yamamoto from ten years later about the tragic situation and is absolutely confused. Tsuna becomes worried about Nana and Kyoko, and Reborn suggests that he look for his Guardians. Tsuna and Gokudera go out with the future Yamamoto to go looking for the Guardians, but…
Source: crunchyroll
